digest_items.title: Verify container image security
digest_items.why: Vulnerable base images introduce security risks to containerized apps
digest_items.fix: Scan images with Trivy or Clair and use minimal base images

digest_items.title: Implement data classification
digest_items.why: Classification ensures appropriate security controls for sensitive data
digest_items.fix: Label data as public, internal, confidential, or restricted

digest_items.title: Implement secure software development lifecycle
digest_items.why: Security integrated throughout SDLC is more effective than bolt-on security
digest_items.fix: Include threat modeling, security reviews, and testing in each phase

digest_items.title: Implement security monitoring
digest_items.why: Real-time monitoring detects attacks and anomalies early
digest_items.fix: Use SIEM tools and set up alerts for suspicious activities

digest_items.title: Review third-party vendor access
digest_items.why: Excessive vendor permissions increase attack surface and compliance risk
digest_items.fix: Audit vendor access quarterly and apply principle of least privilege

digest_items.title: Use principle of least privilege
digest_items.why: Excessive permissions increase blast radius of compromised accounts
digest_items.fix: Grant only minimum necessary permissions for each role
